quotes.quote: I just feel like I'm the luckiest person in the world being able to do what I love and be able to do it all day every day if I like, you know, I mean it's great, I love it.
Have a great day. Note: does not apply to my enemies.
There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
I have learned over the years that the nicest thing I can do is to just say to myself, "Good Morning Darling, I love you; we're going to have a really great day today.
We don't "have" a great day, we "make it" a great day!
It's a great day to be alive. I know the sun's still shining when I close my eyes.
A bad day for your ego is a great day for your soul.
Sometimes I have a great day of filming and sometimes the theater strikes me better. It just depends.
When you're wide awake say it for goodness sake, it's gonna be a great day.
Today, is a great day to make a difference for someone. 'I have a dream'.
I take nothing for granted. I now have only good days, or great days.
Every day is a good day to be alive, whether the sun's shining or not.
Don't expect a great day; create one.
It has happened to me to meet many of the men of my day whom the world agreed to call great.

Do not let us speak of darker days, let us speak rather of sterner days. These are not dark days: these are great days-the greatest days our country has ever lived; and we must all thank God that we have been allowed, each of us according to our stations, to play a part in making these days memorable in the history of our race.
You can have a Great Day, or a Lousy Day; it's totally up to you.
It's a great day in America when white people, black people and Latinos can all come together and pick on another minority.

Today is the great day of one of the revelations of this world. The interrelationships of these individual realms were illumined as by a flash of lightning; they burst unexpected, frightening, and joyous out of the darkness. Never were they so strongly tied together and never so sharply divided.
Everyday above ground is a great day, remember that.

This will be a great day in our history; the date of a New Revolution - quite as much needed as the old one. Even now as I write they are leading old John Brown to execution in Virginia for attempting to rescue slaves! This is sowing the wind to reap the whirlwind which will come soon!
These are not dark days: these are great days - the greatest days our country has ever lived.
I get up every morning and it's going to be a great day. You never know when it's going to be over so I refuse to have a bad day.
Today's a great day to change a life. Starting with yours.
Every day is a great day to give love, spread joy, and SPARKLE!
Make each day a masterpiece. Don't think your best days are out there somewhere. Why not today? Why can't today be a great day? It can if you believe it will.
Every day is a good day. There is something to learn, care and celebrate.
Any day above ground is a good day. Before you complain about anything, be thankful for your life and the things that are still going well.
Joyful morning, good morning, good day.
Good days, bad days, halfway days. But I'm still looking for a great day in the morning.
Let's not waste this time. Cause today is a great day for falling in love.
It's a great day for the valleys. It's a great day for them all.
If there's one great day, if there's one great height. Let it be the time for peace, let it be the time of right.
It's gonna be a great day while you're standing there. Get up and grab a chair.
When you're down and out. Lift up your head and shout.There's gonna be a great day. Angels in the sky. Promise that by and by there's gonna be a great day.
And it's a great day to be alive. I know the sun's still shining. When I close my eyes.
We're gonna swing and sway till that great day. So lace up your shoes, throw 'way your blues.
Oh I believe one great day the rain will come and wash this mess away.
Oh, what a great day to feel alive. Guess I must be livin' right.
These days are great there's work to do.
Great day in the morning my choir sing a pretty song.
On that great day I'm going home to live forever more, just over on heaven's shore.
It's a great day. Be thankful. Put a smile on your face and nothing but blue skies.
A great day is coming, it's not far away. Don't wait the last minute my brother to pray.
But oh, what a great day it was we lived, we loved and it all just sped up around the end.
Believe me, been there, done that but every day around here is great day, remember that.
When soon or later you recognise your fate that will be your great, great day. On the wings of the morning with your own true love.
I see a great day dawning you better heed my warning. Stay on the right side of the road.
